div.div: Ben Dreyfuss bought his mom an iPhone for Christmas. Mama D. tears open the package, finds a shiny aluminum bundle of joy, and then decides to set it up. One problem: When she called Verizon to activate the thing, they told her that her new iPhone was stolen.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V3dh6L&via=Digg&text=Amazon Is Selling Stolen iPhones

div.div: (THAT'S A 'Q' IN CASE YOU DON'T GET IT)

div.a: Cosmic Sans Is The Best Space-Themed Font In The Universe

div.div: A husband and wife team, consisting of designer Brad McNally and printer Sara McNally, have rallied a band of designers to help them create a series of spaced-themed typographic art prints—that features everyone’s ‘favorite’ font: Comic Sans!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y6U1Wr&via=Digg&text=Cosmic Sans Is The Best Space-Themed Font In The Universe

div.a: New Smartphone Or Headphones? Here Are A Few Tips To Prevent Hearing Loss

div.div: This holiday season, many of us will be tearing the cellophane off of a hot new pair of headphones. Before you decide to test the limits of OSHA’s volume regulations on your eardrums, we thought you’d want to know some helpful tips so you can keep on jamming for the rest of your life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UreZ4y&via=Digg&text=New Smartphone Or Headphones? Here Are A Few Tips To Prevent Hearing Loss

div.div: When an armed gang member came to her high-school campus five years ago, principal Shanley Rhodes raced to stop him. Now she’s the godmother of his son.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ujqrht&via=Digg&text=I Tackled A School Gunman

div.a: How Excess Holiday Eating Disturbs Your 'Food Clock'

div.div: If the sinful excess of holiday eating sends your system into butter-slathered, brandy-soaked overload, you are not alone: People who are jet-lagged, people who work graveyard shifts and plain-old late-night snackers know just how you feel.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TkRAQ9&via=Digg&text=How Excess Holiday Eating Disturbs Your 'Food Clock'

div.div: DO THEY KNOW IT'S CHRISTMAS TIME AT ALL?

div.a: Do Jews In China Eat Chinese Food On Christmas?

div.div: The 1000 or so Jews who live in Beijing often get asked about how much money they make, why they are so smart, and how Jews such as Bill Gates and Warren Buffet (incidentally, both gentiles) have made so much money. So what's it like to be a Jew in China on Christmas?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WCKK9j&via=Digg&text=Do Jews In China Eat Chinese Food On Christmas?

div.a: The Link Between Real And Virtual Firearms

div.div: While studies have found no connection between video games and gun violence, the case of Medal of Honor Warfighter illustrates how the firearms and video game industries have quietly forged a mutually beneficial marketing relationship.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VgBFUJ&via=Digg&text=The Link Between Real And Virtual Firearms

div.a: Why Did NORAD Start Tracking Santa?

div.div: How a simple wrong phone number ended up bringing joy to children everywhere.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V5Y0RH&via=Digg&text=Why Did NORAD Start Tracking Santa?

div.a: Adulterers Beware: Christmas Day The Peak Time For 'Text Message Bustings'

div.div: It is meant to be a time of peace and love. But Christmas Day has become the day of the year when unfaithful husbands are most likely to be caught out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ROl5ga&via=Digg&text=Adulterers Beware: Christmas Day The Peak Time For 'Text Message Bustings'

div.div: CHAT ON THE BELL PICTUREPHONE FOR ONLY $15

div.a: Facebook?! Twitter?! Instagram?! We Did That 40 Years Ago

div.div: Before Facebook and Facetime and Google+ and Twitter, there was Plato and the Bell Picturephone and the Dynabook and the Xerox LiveBoard. Social media is nothing new. It just has better packaging -- and better marketing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12Ab0p5&via=Digg&text=Facebook?! Twitter?! Instagram?! We Did That 40 Years Ago

div.div: WHEN ONE HAND IS, AHEM, OCCUPIED
At times when you don’t have two fingers to apply to your smartphone, Fat Thumb and GripSense allow you to interact with your phone using just one hand and an occasional digit.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10fvGmP&via=Digg&text=The Anti Pinch To Zoom

div.a: Is Santa A Democrat Or A Republican?

div.div: It seems that the "binders full of women" and all the Bain Capital deals don't bother Santa Claus who, according to a Public Policy Polling survey, thinks Mitt Romney has been a "good boy" deserving of presents.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ycm2vy&via=Digg&text=Is Santa A Democrat Or A Republican?

div.a: How The Queen Of England Beat Everyone To The Internet

div.div: The date was March 26, 1976, and the system was ARPANET, the computer network that eventually morphed into the internet. The Queen was on hand to christen the connection, and in the process, she became one of the first heads of state to send an e-mail.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uk9bca&via=Digg&text=How The Queen Of England Beat Everyone To The Internet

div.a: Christmas Movie Options According To The Critics

div.div: No matter what religion you are, 'tis the season for going to see a movie. Now that all of the big Oscar-hungry releases are out there are good choices aplenty at the multiplex for the first time in a long while.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WNZztB&via=Digg&text=Christmas Movie Options According To The Critics

div.a: The Most Confusing Christmas Music Lyrics Explained

div.div: Who is Parson Brown? What is figgy pudding? And how, exactly, do you don gay apparel? A glossary of what all those strange phrases in classic Christmas songs really mean.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ujqji8&via=Digg&text=The Most Confusing Christmas Music Lyrics Explained

div.div: THEY'LL BE GONE IN A BLINK

div.a: Tips For Capturing Holiday Light Memories With Your iPhone Camera

div.div: The iPhone has a great little digital camera built into it. If you're thinking about getting those last photos of the neighborhood and indoor holiday lights before they all come down, here are a few hints to make sure you get a memorable picture.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WOoA7N&via=Digg&text=Tips For Capturing Holiday Light Memories With Your iPhone Camera

div.a: Mall Santa Gives Shy 3-Year-Old Deaf Boy A Heartwarming Christmas Surprise

div.div: Cameron Sylvester, 3, who is deaf, is caught off guard when a Santa at a mall in Foxboro, a suburb of Boston, uses sign language. Too afraid to sit in Santa’s lap, the boy comes to life when he sees him sign, 'Have you been a good boy?'

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WCHlHy&via=Digg&text=Mall Santa Gives Shy 3-Year-Old Deaf Boy A Heartwarming Christmas Surprise

div.div: ‘Twas the night before Christmas, when all through the house, not a creature was stirring, not even those in the lighthearted holiday fare you were planning to watch on Netflix, which has been down since 1pm PST for some customers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YGYWCt&via=Digg&text=Netflix Crippled On Christmas Eve

div.div: DON'T NEED A GUITAR STRAP IN SPACE

div.a: Astronaut Records First Song In Space, Shares Holiday Tweets

div.div: In a Reddit "ask me anything" session earlier this month, Canadian astronaut Chris Hadfield opened up about life in space, and said he plans to "deliberately mentally get away" from his normal duties by playing guitar.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W3n2AP&via=Digg&text=Astronaut Records First Song In Space, Shares Holiday Tweets

div.a: Why 'Django' Is Better Movie About Slavery Than 'Lincoln'

div.div: One of the strangest cultural trends of 2012 — the year in which Americans handily reelected an African-American president despite the white vote — has been the tendency of major white directors to make films about black liberation.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UoLMXV&via=Digg&text=Why 'Django' Is Better Movie About Slavery Than 'Lincoln'

div.a: What To Download On Your New Device

div.div: The wrapping paper’s in a pile on the floor, but the fun has just begun. That shiny new gadget in your hands is just waiting to be filled with content.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y96AAp&via=Digg&text=What To Download On Your New Device
